comments.body: I fixed Intellij now yeswterday but since it's not useable anyway I guess we can keep it commented out to not waste time for a full build with it

comments.diffHunk:
@@ -57,4 +58,26 @@ project(':webview') {
 
         nodeModulesDir = file('src')
     }
-}
\ No newline at end of file
+}
+
+
+
+project(':server') {
+    apply plugin: 'scala'
+    apply plugin: 'org.jetbrains.intellij'
+    apply plugin: 'com.github.maiflai.scalatest'
+
+    dependencies {
+        implementation 'org.scala-lang:scala-library:2.13.1'
+        implementation 'io.spray:spray-json_2.13:1.3.5'
+        implementation "org.scalaj:scalaj-http_2.13:2.4.2"
+        implementation "com.typesafe:config:1.4.0"
+        implementation "org.rogach:scallop_2.13:3.4.0"
+        testCompile 'org.scalatest:scalatest_2.13:3.1.1'
+        testRuntime 'org.pegdown:pegdown:1.4.2'

comments.body:
Scallop to parse arguments
Scalatest- obvious
pegdown- probably it is fix for lacking import in scalatest. I have problems during run scalatest suite- it needs additional library to generate report.
